title: Rooftopics
creator_credit: Antonio Colacino, Joe Scully and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Views of Sydney Harbour, city and inner suburbs from the roof-tops of various buildings. Shows scenes of everyday activities, roof gardens, play-grounds, swimming pools, street traffic, etc. viewed from above. Includes humorous animated sequence involving a man, his towel and a woman beside a swimming pool. No spoken commentary. Edited by Wayne Le Clos; photographed by George Alexander; music by Eric Gross and script by Antonio Colacino.
